definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: Tutti executed a fabulous fake faint, swooning cartoonishly right to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 图蒂假装晕倒，像卡通人物似的昏倒在地。

sentences.english: Recently, have you seen 3D cartoon film Pigman in CCTVstation?
sentences.chinese: 最近，你看过中央台播出的3D卡通片《猪猪侠》吗？

sentences.english: But this was a caricature of the breed.
sentences.chinese: 但这是只卡通版的指示犬。

sentences.english: Chinese boys watch a cartoon at a toy fair in Beijing on July 29 2010.
sentences.chinese: 北京的玩具展会场中，两小男孩津津有味地在看卡通。

sentences.english: If touching sign, display this little cartoon bubble.
sentences.chinese: 如果触摸那个符号，就会显示那些卡通小泡泡。

sentences.english: We try to keep our content at the same level of one of these old cartoons.
sentences.chinese: 我们试着让我们的内容保持在某部老卡通的水平。

sentences.english: Bugs Bunny is my favorite cartoon character.
sentences.chinese: 兔八哥是我最喜欢的卡通人物。

sentences.english: The little girl appears to be reading cartoon books.
sentences.chinese: 这个小女孩好像正在读卡通书。

sentences.english: The company syndicates cartoons to newspapers across the country.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司向全国各地的报纸出售漫画卡通。

sentences.english: The Monkey King is a cartoon character who causes problems in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 美猴王是一个卡通角色，他在天庭上制造了很多麻烦。

sentences.english: I am taking my children to see some cartoons this weekend.
sentences.chinese: 这个周末我要带小孩去看卡通影片。

sentences.english: While you're adults like watch cartoon.
This movie theater often shows the latest cartoon films.
sentences.chinese: 这家电影院经常放映一些最新的卡通电影。

sentences.english: Lily: I think you should report your loss of One-Card.
sentences.chinese: 我想你应该先去挂失一下你的一卡通。
这部卡通令孩子们感动。

sentences.english: One theater shows cartoons all day.
sentences.chinese: 其中一家全天放映卡通片。

definition: qualities that delight children (e.g. bold colors in a picture, anthropomorphized characters in a TV show, the physical challenge of playground equipment)
Winnie-the-Pooh (bear character in children's stories by A. A. Milne adapted by Disney)
Tuzki, a popular Chinese illustrated rabbit character
toy figurine/action figure/stuffed animal/doll/(fig.) sb's plaything
